channel.title: Can someone recommend me a source?
channel.description:
Hi, I am going to start a Runescape Private Server but I don't have a source code or client. I always like the latest stuff so I don't really want 317. I would like it to be 508+ and have MySQL as I have experience with queries, web management, databases and some PHP Coding. If you think that it's stupid just to get a source and make a server based on it as it will be the same thing, I can code a little bit in Java, I can't write my own from scratch but I can edit anything from commands to shops, NPCs exp rates and I am a fast learner. I was trying out Jolt Environment v2 which was coded in C# as it has mysql and you can add worlds and it was pretty stable, But I found that I didn't really like it as no npcs were spawned and I just couldn't get used to it.
Thanks guys!

item.title: Can someone recommend me a source?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

If you wanna start from scratch, testscape
